name: nnexpcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0[^]c1)∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn))

-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn))

comment: Closure of exponentiation of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
